title: What do we have in store for students?
text: Khayr helps children in improving their discipline issues by the betterment of their behaviour. This is achieved through the relaxation features which improve the mood of the students.

section.title: Games
section.content: The games feature provides fun, digitally stimulating activities to students which is an efficient tool to vent out negative energy and the rewards earned in the games makes the students happy and motives them to do well.

section.title: Learn
section.content: The learn feature offers a variety of learning opportunities for children where they can choose to learn music and arts. Once the students have learned the selected activity, they will gain points of participation.
